DataSource.Query: SELECT transactions.inventory_transfer_deliveries.inventory_transfer_delivery_id, transactions.inventory_transfer_deliveries.transaction_ts, transactions.inventory_transfer_deliveries.value_date, office.users.user_name AS entered_by, delivered_by_user.user_name AS delivered_by, office.offices.office_name, transactions.inventory_transfer_deliveries.reference_number, transactions.inventory_transfer_deliveries.statement_reference, source_store.store_name AS source_store, destination_store.store_name AS destination_store FROM transactions.inventory_transfer_deliveries INNER JOIN office.offices ON transactions.inventory_transfer_deliveries.office_id = office.offices.office_id INNER JOIN office.users ON transactions.inventory_transfer_deliveries.user_id = office.users.user_id INNER JOIN office.stores AS source_store ON transactions.inventory_transfer_deliveries.source_store_id = source_store.store_id INNER JOIN office.stores AS destination_store ON transactions.inventory_transfer_deliveries.destination_store_id = destination_store.store_id LEFT JOIN office.users AS delivered_by_user ON transactions.inventory_transfer_deliveries.user_id = delivered_by_user.user_id WHERE transactions.inventory_transfer_deliveries.inventory_transfer_delivery_id=@id;

SELECT core.items.item_code, core.items.item_name, transactions.inventory_transfer_delivery_details.quantity, core.units.unit_name FROM transactions.inventory_transfer_delivery_details INNER JOIN transactions.inventory_transfer_deliveries ON transactions.inventory_transfer_delivery_details.inventory_transfer_delivery_id = transactions.inventory_transfer_deliveries.inventory_transfer_delivery_id INNER JOIN core.items ON transactions.inventory_transfer_delivery_details.item_id = core.items.item_id INNER JOIN core.units ON transactions.inventory_transfer_delivery_details.unit_id = core.units.unit_id WHERE transactions.inventory_transfer_deliveries.inventory_transfer_delivery_id = @id ORDER BY transactions.inventory_transfer_deliveries.inventory_transfer_delivery_id;
